snippet: Despite the government’s encouraging jobs report, the S.&P. 500 closed lower for a ninth straight day, the longest losing streak in 36 years....
lead_paragraph: Despite the government’s encouraging jobs report, the S.&P. 500 closed lower for a ninth straight day, the longest losing streak in 36 years.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Lower, Extending a Losing Streak
headline.print_headline: Wall Street’s Losing Streak  Persists as Election Looms
